```{r}

extract_user_id <- function(imported_data) {
  extracted_id <- imported_data %>%
    dplyr::mutate(
      user_id = str_extract(
        file_path_id,
        "user_[1-9][0-9]?"
      ),
      .before = everything()
    ) %>%
    select(-file_path_id)
  return(extracted_id)
}

extract_user_id(user_info_df)
```
